tool_description:
This API returns information on the 5 major European football leagues.
Get standings, matches, scorers and more.
name: Zeus API
title: Zeus API

api_list.name: Competitions Matches
api_list.description: List the current matches for a league 🆚.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zeus-api1.p.rapidapi.com/competitions/LI1/matches/2021/24"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zeus-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zeus-api1.p.rapidapi.com/competitions/{id}/matches/{year}/{round}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zeus-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
